content.rendered:
Kinopoisk.ru – this is most popular Russian movie search service with 1 000 000 daily auditory. Now all information about films is avaliable for smartphones users.

Application helps to find out detailed information about any movie or actor, watch trailers, read users reviews and find showtimes at cinemas in Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Kazakhstan.

Applications have 5 stars rating in AppStore, 4,5 in Android Market and more than 500 000 installations.

Link to AppStore: http://itunes.apple.com/ru/app/id477718890?mt=8
Link to Android Market: https://market.android.com/details?id=ru.kinopoisk

excerpt.rendered: Application helps to find out detailed information about any movie or actor, watch trailers, read users reviews and find showtimes at cinemas in Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Kazakhstan.
